leadership.title: Event Crew
leadership.description: Actively contributed as a crew member for the Glow Night Run, communicated with external parties and setting up the station for the event.

leadership.title: Head of Mastery and Demonstration Department
leadership.description: Led the Mastery and Demonstration Department, training members according to Seni Silat Cekak Pusaka Hanafi syllabus and organizing martial arts demonstrations within the campus.
achievements: Successfully demonstrated martial arts display within the campus

leadership.title: Programming Clinic Mentor
leadership.description: Joined the programming clinic annually as a mentor, teaching fresh years about coding concepts and increasing their programming skills.

leadership.title: Academic Visit to Vietnam
leadership.description: Participated in academic visit to Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology (HCMUT) and VNG Corporation, attending lectures on AI and Cybersecurity.
achievements: Attended lectures on Artificial Intelligence and Cybersecurity at HCMUT

leadership.title: UTMKL PPG Visit
leadership.description: Attended seminar from PPG IT Council at UTMKL on PPG active involvement in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning with their own chatbot ChatPPG.
achievements: Gained insights into industry AI/ML practices
